name: amelioration
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of making a bad or unpleasant situation better: Regular exercise can provide gradual amelioration of anxiety. Treatment for her allergies led to the amelioration of her symptoms. See
ameliorate
More examplesFewer examplesThe most that could be hoped for in the 1920s was the amelioration of a small number of the worst houses. We've seen some amelioration of atmospheric greenhouse gas emissions.Several programmes are aimed at amelioration of the industrial pollution of the creek.
